Carpet Depot Woodstock...what a find.  Our first interaction was with Jeremy Eaves and he was phenomenal.  Helped us find our perfect LVP flooring and carpet in a matter of minutes.  Matt was able to come out in a few days to get all of our rooms measured and we were put on the schedule to be installed that same week.  Juan and his team were superb in getting all of the old flooring up and new down in just 2 days.  We are very happy with the quality of product from Carpet Depot and the level of service received from Jeremy, Matt and Juan.  Fair pricing, quick service and friendly staff.  Definitely give them a call for your next flooring project.  THANK YOU!!!
Jeremy did a phenomenal job and was so patient with our selecting an LVP color/style! The entire crew was impressive! Overall, we could not be happier!!!!!! Thank you!!!!!

We chose Woodstock Carpet Depot from the reviews we read online and they lived up to their 5 star ratings!   My husband likes to shop around for the best price, we got that and great service!  We appreciate their honesty and integrity, and recommend them !
